channel.title: 法新社
channel.description: 这是一个追踪法新社news的种子

item.title: 朝鲜国家媒体图片显示，朝鲜领导人金正恩在监督军事训练时驾驶一辆 "新型主战坦克
item.description:
North Korean state media images show leader Kim Jong Un driving a "new-type main battle tank" while overseeing military training exerciseshttps://t.co/xVVcN8kgCN pic.twitter.com/3S2eAmXWK5

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 14, 2024

item.title: OpenAI 与法国《世界报》和西班牙企业集团 Prisa Media 合作，表示打算开发其 ChatGPT 人工智能工具的新闻相关用途
item.description:
OpenAI partners with French daily Le Monde and Spanish conglomerate Prisa Media, saying it intends to develop news-related uses of its ChatGPT artificial intelligence toolhttps://t.co/0o9aJZ8Qmo pic.twitter.com/rBUIerK8Q3

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 14, 2024

item.title: 濒临灭绝的巨型红杉树在英国茁壮成长。目前，英国全国约有 50 万棵巨型红杉树，超过了其原产地加利福尼亚州的 8 万棵左右。研究表明，这些树木还可以为捕捉碳排放做出重大贡献
item.description:
Endangered giant redwood trees thriving in the UK.

There are now some 500,000 across the UK -- more than the 80,000 or so in their native California. The trees could also be significantly contributing to capturing carbon emissions, research showshttps://t.co/gudqmk1QlN pic.twitter.com/sWnuJ7MnZX

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 14, 2024

item.title: @AFP的蒂莫西-A-克拉里（Timothy A. Clary）拍摄了一架标志性的超音速协和式喷气式飞机在驳船上经过纽约的自由女神像，并将其运往泽西市的Weeks Marine进行储存。
item.description:
Grand ladies.@AFP's Timothy A. Clary photographs an iconic supersonic Concorde jet passing - on a barge - the Statue of Liberty in New York, as it makes its way to Weeks Marine in Jersey City for storage.

The retired British Airways Concorde G-BOAD (Alpha Delta) supersonic… pic.twitter.com/0nwXN7H5I3

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 14, 2024

item.title: 贾东-桑乔在第 3 分钟的进球和马尔科-罗伊斯在最后时刻的绝杀帮助多特蒙德以 2-0 的比分晋级欧洲冠军联赛八强，并以 3-1 的总比分锁定胜局
item.description:
A third-minute goal from Jadon Sancho and Marco Reus' late strike sent Borussia Dortmund through to the Champions League last eight with a 2-0 win, sealing a 3-1 aggregate victory https://t.co/XkWRZabhRI

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 13, 2024

item.title: 美国财政部长珍妮特-耶伦（Janet Yellen）周三在接受采访时表示，预计美国经济不会出现滞胀。
item.description:
The US economy is not expected to see stagflation, Treasury Secretary Janet Yellen said in an interview broadcast Wednesday, adding that most forecasters expect inflation to cool as housing costs move lower https://t.co/fvJyeQQ3Lm

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 13, 2024

item.title: 距离美国总统大选还有八个月，竞选活动已从各政党的提名竞争转入堑壕战，这将是记忆中最漫长、最残酷的正面对决之一
item.description:
Eight months ahead of the US presidential election, the campaign moves from the parties' nominating contests to the trench warfare of what promises to be one of the longest, most brutal head-to-head showdowns in memory https://t.co/SwxWEQWMr5 pic.twitter.com/lSyFAYGXE9

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 13, 2024

item.title: 演员奥利维亚-蒙恩（Olivia Munn）透露，在被诊断出患有乳腺癌后，她接受了双乳切除术。
item.description:

item.title: 视频加沙地带面临严重的粮食短缺和迫在眉睫的饥荒威胁，许多巴勒斯坦人希望购买斋月流行甜点 "Qatayef"，但发现价格昂贵，难以支付
item.description:
VIDEO: As dire food shortages and looming famine threaten the Gaza Strip, many Palestinians hoping to buy the popular Ramadan dessert known as "Qatayef" have found the price too costly to pay pic.twitter.com/5yhjFbcG0f

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 13, 2024

item.title: 在陷入危机的海地总理同意让位并由一个过渡管理机构取而代之之后，一位势力强大的海地黑帮头目承诺继续他的斗争，这场斗争已使海地陷入混乱
item.description:
A powerful Haitian gang leader pledged to continue his fight that has plunged the country into chaos, after the crisis-wracked nation's prime minister agreed to step aside and be replaced by a transitional governing body https://t.co/QHf2gX9BW2 pic.twitter.com/Haj7MhYSWk

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 13, 2024

item.title: 法国名校巴黎政治学院（Sciences Po）因其院长涉嫌家庭暴力而辞职，以及一场支持巴勒斯坦的示威游行引发了反犹太主义的指控，从而成为全国瞩目的焦点。
item.description:
Elite French university Sciences Po was dragged into the national spotlight as its director quit over alleged domestic violence and a pro-Palestinian demonstration sparked accusations of anti-Semitism https://t.co/fIwXjRa9cW

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 13, 2024

item.title: 在下个月美国国税局（IRS）申报截止日期到来之前，左倾社交媒体账户再次宣称，特朗普为年收入低于 7.5 万美元的美国人增加了税收。
item.description:
Ahead of next month's IRS filing deadline, left-leaning social media accounts have resurfaced a claim that Trump raised taxes for Americans making less than $75,000 per year.

Tax experts told me that's misleading https://t.co/nnXo9yikfR

— Daniel Funke (@dpfunke) March 13, 2024

item.title: 每年，墨西哥中部圣地亚哥-夏利钦特拉的人们都会用歌声、舞蹈和礼物来庆祝波波卡特佩特火山的 "生日"。
item.description:
Each year, people from Santiago Xalitzintla in central Mexico celebrate the "birthday" of the Popocatepetl volcano with songs, dance and gifts.
Popocatepetl is considered one of the most dangerous volcanoes because some 25 million people live within 100 kilometers pic.twitter.com/we70Pde8y5

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 13, 2024

item.title: 全球汽车制造商竞相投入数十亿美元，在拉丁美洲最大的经济体巴西开发绿色汽车，巴西正在为混合动力革命充电
item.description:
Brazil is charging up for a hybrid revolution as global car manufacturers race to pump billions of dollars into the development of green vehicles in Latin America's biggest economy https://t.co/Lx40qwn1iw

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 13, 2024

item.title: 尼日利亚新闻部长表示，尼日利亚总统已命令安全部队不要为释放上周被枪手劫持的 250 多名小学生支付赎金。
item.description:
Nigeria's president has ordered security forces not to pay a ransom for the release of more than 250 school pupils seized by gunmen last week, the country's information minister said https://t.co/DCzs3DXskV pic.twitter.com/9FUTE0W7UV

item.title: 科学家们说，健康珊瑚礁的录音--水下的鱼鸣和虾蛄的噼啪声--可能有助于恢复受气候和人类影响破坏的珊瑚生态系统。
item.description:
Audio recordings of healthy reefs -- an underwater chorus of fish songs and crackles from snapping shrimp -- may help efforts to restore coral ecosystems harmed by climate and human impacts, scientists say https://t.co/BZ7ri6Erw6 pic.twitter.com/MrY8I1NvMl

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 13, 2024

item.title: 阿迪达斯公布了三十多年来的首次亏损，原因是结束了与坎耶-维斯特的合作，但该公司坚称已开始扭转颓势
item.description:
Adidas reported its first loss in over three decades due to the fallout from the end of its collaboration with Kanye West, but the company insisted it was starting to turn its fortunes around https://t.co/YG7zrCqUuE

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 13, 2024

item.title: "我怎么付钱给你？在古巴，这个问题已经超出了现金或银行卡的范畴，因为市民们需要与四种不同的货币打交道，他们变成了业余交易者，试图从自己的钱中榨取最大的价值。
item.description:
"How can I pay you?": In Cuba, the question goes beyond cash or card as citizens grapple with four different currencies, turning them into amateur traders as they try to squeeze the most value out of their money https://t.co/shgsXYwN1z

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 13, 2024

item.title: 部长称英国政府将寻求禁止外国国有企业控股英国报纸
item.description:
UK govt to seek ban on foreign state ownership of British newspapers, minister says pic.twitter.com/eXD85wXson

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 13, 2024

item.title: 为什么有些物种在进化过程中会出现更年期，即雌性动物在停止繁殖后还能活很多年？鲸鱼更年期揭示人类进化之谜
item.description:
Why have some species evolved to have menopause, in which females live many years after they stop being able to reproduce? Whale menopause sheds light on the human evolutionary mystery https://t.co/qOyVeGfqv1 pic.twitter.com/XmDjp6JaYm

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 13, 2024

item.title: 关于#凯特-米德尔顿（KateMiddleton）的阴谋论暴露了虚假信息时代数字环境的脆弱性，虚假信息侵蚀了人们的信任，并将社交媒体用户变成了侦探@AFP @AFPFactCheck
item.description:
'Katespiracy' explodes after UK photo gaffe

Swirling conspiracies about #KateMiddleton lay bare the fragility of the digital landscape in the age of disinformation that has eroded trust and turned social media users into sleuths@AFP @AFPFactCheckhttps://t.co/vNClpxlI8f

— Anuj Chopra (@AnujChopra) March 13, 2024

item.title: 国际能源机构（International Energy Agency）周三表示，化石燃料工业释放出的地球供暖甲烷在2023年将升至接近历史最高水平，尽管目前已有技术几乎不需要成本就能遏制这种污染➡️。
item.description:
Planet-heating methane released by the fossil fuel industry rose to near record highs in 2023 despite technology available to curb this pollution at virtually no cost, the International Energy Agency said on Wednesday ➡️ https://t.co/xO8DjocTP7 pic.twitter.com/icukKJQ7lX

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 13, 2024

item.title: #BREAKING 美国众议院以压倒性多数通过法案，迫使 TikTok 从中国所有者手中撤资，否则将被禁用 #BREAKING 美国众议院以压倒性多数通过法案，迫使 TikTok 从中国所有者手中撤资，否则将被禁用
item.description:
#BREAKING US House of Representatives overwhelmingly approves bill that would force TikTok to divest from Chinese owner or get banned pic.twitter.com/puVLRYm4SR

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 13, 2024

item.title: 视频：🇦🇫 失业的阿富汗人冒着死亡和债务的危险寻找金矿在这个半数人口生活贫困的国家，失业男子在东北部山区以采金为生，碰运气。
item.description:
VIDEO: 🇦🇫 Unemployed Afghans risk death and debt in hunt for gold

In a country where half the population live in poverty, unemployed men try their luck carving out a dangerous living as gold miners in the northeastern mountains.

📹 @SusannahWalden pic.twitter.com/4MFNOtTjNg

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 13, 2024

item.title: 多特蒙德主教练埃丁-特尔季奇（Edin Terzic）知道，周三主场迎战埃因霍温队的欧洲冠军联赛 16 强赛第二回合比赛中，他的帅位岌岌可危 ➡️ @DanielWighton #AFPSports #UCL #BVBPSV

Borussia Dortmund coach Edin Terzic will know his job is on the line in Wednesday's Champions League last-16 second leg at home to PSV Eindhoven ➡️ https://t.co/vlvaZaiJwt @DanielWighton #AFPSports #UCL #BVBPSV pic.twitter.com/CRiCmMj7YH

item.title: #印尼--巴厘岛人在克东加南（Kedonganan）村参加泥浆浴传统，称为 "Mebuug-buugan"，这是在巴厘岛 "沉默日"（Nyepi）后一天举行的活动，旨在中和不好的性格。
item.description:
#Indonesia - Balinese people take part in a mud bath tradition, known as Mebuug-buugan, held a day after Nyepi - the Balinese "Day of Silence" - aimed at neutralising bad traits, in the village of Kedonganan.
📸 Sonny Tumbelaka #AFP pic.twitter.com/lmF54vRfAU

— AFP Photo (@AFPphoto) March 12, 2024

item.title: #联合国机构联合国近东巴勒斯坦难民救济和工程处称其位于加沙拉法的援助仓库遭到 "袭击"，数十人受伤
item.description:
